Currently the last version size: save success Share Sport detail history HRrest: The number of heartbeats per minute in a normal person is generally 60 to 100 in a quiet state. Exercise Heart Rate: During exercise, the body\'s exercise state can be judged according to the heart rate interval. Only by selecting an appropriate heart rate interval can a better exercise state be achieved, and an appropriate heart rate interval can be used to achieve a better exercise effect. \n*The data and suggestions provided are for reference only and cannot be used as a basis for clinical diagnosis and treatment Normal Range: \n Systolic blood pressure: 90-139 mmHg\n/ diastolic blood pressure: 60-89 mmHg"\n * The data and recommendations provided are for reference only and cannot be used as a basis for clinical diagnosis and treatment Sleep is one of the important life-sustaining behaviors of beings. The hardware device records your sleep status, analyzes the sleep quality, and helps you understand and adjust your sleep habits. \n*The data suggestions provided are for reference only and cannot be used as a basis for clinical diagnosis and treatment About blood oxygen saturation data: Blood oxygen saturation is the percentage of the capacity of oxygen-bound oxyhemoglobin in the blood to the total bound hemoglobin capacity, that is, the concentration of blood oxygen in the blood, which is an important biological parameter of breathing and circulation. The oxygen saturation of normal arteries is about 95% to 99%. \n*The data and suggestions provided are for reference only and cannot be used as a basis for clinical diagnosis and treatment

unauthorized authorized Push SMS messages to the watch for display Permission description Fitalent permissions instructions To ensure the normal use of the APP, please enable the following permissions ACCESS_BLUETOOTH Need to use the phone\'s Bluetooth function to connect to the Bluetooth watch Use Location Map running track record and search Bluetooth watch need to turn on the phone GPS switch ACCESS_LOCAL Get high-precision position information for running Camera permission use Use the camera to take a picture as an avatar ACCESS_WRITE The camera takes a picture and saves, select a picture from the album as the avatar ACCESS_CAMERA Message reminder function, incoming call reminds the watch to check the current incoming call status ACCESS_CONTACTS When a call comes in, the watch can display the name and phone number
